group_1.narration: But what good is coming up with designs @if you can't show them off to people?
It's important to show your work to people!
So who was I going to show them to?@...That should be obvious.
To [textRed:Ria Ami]!@Because she's the cutest girl around!
She's got to have a good fashion sense to@be in those fashion magazines...
She and I are both into the same thing!@I know she'll get what I'm doing!
Then, with her connections, I can make@it into the fashion world!

group_1.textRight: Ah! [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]Ahem...@I ummm, I've got a case of the hiccups...

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm Kanoko Yayoi! @Uh, there's something I want you to see!

group_1.textRight: You don't have to rush.@Take a deep breath, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Some designs I came up with!@Clothing designs!
Yeah! You see, ummm...@I'm a fashion designer...
I mean I want to be one...

group_1.textRight: So you're not one yet, then?

group_1.textLeft: No, but I will be one for sure!@You'll believe me when you have a look!
Since you've got the best fashion sense@and you're so cute!
Yes, of course!@So please! Just have a look!

group_1.textRight: Very well,[chara:301001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy] I'll give them a glance!@Hmmm...

group_1.narration: At first her face was stern, like someone@looking over a true masterpiece...

group_1.textRight: ...How can I put this...I mean...@They ummm, they're [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]so unique!
Yeah, like these ones with all the hands@growing out of the back...

Oh, right...@[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][chara:301001:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into][freeze:1][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]Yeah, like I said, super unique!
These designs are way past my ability@to judge!

group_1.narration: I had no idea my talent was on that level!
She suggested that I show my designs to@someone else, too.
I decided that yes, I'd love to get@more opinions...!
